org.apache.lucene.search

Class LeafSimScorer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.search.LeafSimScorer

  • public final class LeafSimScorer
extends Object
    Similarity.SimScorer on a specific LeafReader.

      • score

        public float score(int doc,
                   float freq)
            throws IOException
        Score the provided document assuming the given term document frequency. This method must be called on non-decreasing sequences of doc ids.
        Throws:
        IOException
        See Also:
